_comment_files: Glob patterns for files whose changes trigger automatic patch bumps (e.g. 'src/**/*.py')
_comment_updates: Files to update with new version on bump. 'file' replaces entire file; ['pattern'] does find-and-replace
_comment_subdirs: Add subdirectory configs as top-level keys for monorepo support. Tags become <subdir>/vX.Y.Z. Example: "frontend": { "version_file": "frontend/VERSION", "files": [...], "updates": {...} }
